name: Creative Problem Solving and Critical Thinking
description:
A 16 hour online course in which participants will get an introduction to agile product development and desgin thinking, offering a different and effective approach to product development, one that results in valuable solutions to meaningful problems.

To prove completion of this online course, the student must provide a copy of the course completion certificate provided by the course provider. We also have access to the Course Provider system and can verifiy % complete and level of interaction with the course if there is any doubt about the level of engagement.

alignment.targetDescription: Institute of Coding recognition of self assessed knowledge

criteria.narrative: Participants must complete the course to be awarded with the digital badge.
